price: dan berlaku angkuhlah Firʻawn  dan bala tentaranya di bumi (Mesir) tanpa alasan yang benar dan mereka menyangka bahwa mereka tidak akan dikembalikan kepada Kami.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'takbara huwa wajunūduhu fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi waẓannū annahum ilaynā lā yur'jaʿūna
